name: Greena
slogan: Climate tech - building technology products to help people live sustainable lives

team.title: Product & Technology
team.name: Julian Harris
team.bioHtml: I create great software that people love: Ex-Googler heading product & technology at Bright Yellow Group, a London climate change startup.

team.title: Founder
team.name: Anil Sood
team.bioHtml: Left my role as Head of Sales & Advisory EMEA investment banking to develop a sustainability platform to help our planet and its inhabitants. Purpose led CEO

jobs.title: Designer / Illustrator
jobs.description:
**The Role**
We're seeking a highly creative visual designer / illustrator who has skills and/or experience in cutting-edge visual communications to work initially on a small project to help build the visual elements of the next iteration of our product. Our design philosophy (below) dictates that this person will flourish under substantial ambiguity and comfortable challenging assumptions about how visual elements can effect powerful experiences. You'll be working directly with Anil Sood (CEO) and Julian Harris (Product & Technology).
**About Bright Yellow**
We believe in simplifying the journey of living sustainably.  
We are helping people live a happier and more sustainable life by building a digital sustainability coach, connecting lifestyle to action.
Greena is an app that helps formulate sustainability goals important to you, be it a personal best, or small but persistent changes that over time can make a meaningful difference to the planet. 
**Our Culture**
Bright Yellow is led by CEO Anil Sood and Product & Technology by Julian Harris. with extensive experience over several decades holding senior leadership positions with top global brands including Google and Goldman Sachs. They left to create something new, with a strong conviction that the best and most meaningful way to contribute to the world is to use their skills and experience to help combat climate change. 
This strong conviction about the urgency of the climate crisis is an important foundation of our culture and others that join us will share a similar level of conviction, as a foundational uniting force. 
**How We Work**
We are remote-first, and successful candidates will have demonstrated how they're able to convey complex ideas and influence thinking in this environment. We are highly reflective and believe in rapid iteration of tangible outcomes to gain the best insight.
**Our Design Philosophy**
We want every aspect of our experience to be a WOW moment: beautiful, calming, clarifying, and exceptionally engaging. We expect the visual design and illustration to be a particularly critical component of Greena and genuinely set new standards in what people expect of a digital coach. 
**The Qualities We Seek**
This is a tremendous opportunity for someone who is passionate about climate change, and wants to work with a team that is harnessing the very latest best practice in conversational design, digital coaching, behavioural science, and privacy-first design. We're looking for a self-starter who desires to be a pioneer, a leader in design using technology as a competitive differentiator, someone who is comfortable in the face of substantial uncertainty, and able to create order from chaos.
Our plans are very ambitious, and we expect to be growing quickly by year end. As such, this role will be particularly suited to those who are interested in coming in at an earlier stage to help shape the product and business foundations, with view to becoming full time, potentially growing with us into a leadership position with a team of your own.
